body_html:
I've had mixed luck replicating the work on Atari, but I know there are many differences between the Gym environments and how DM evaluate, so my findings are inconclusive.

@jvmancuso *her :) Although after looking at your code and the paper the logic for the layer itself seems fine, so it may not be worth sending it someone who doesn't use PyTorch. Once you send in a PR I'll comment further on the code itself.

body:
I've had mixed luck replicating the work on Atari, but I know there are many differences between the Gym environments and how DM evaluate, so my findings are inconclusive.

@jvmancuso *her :) Although after looking at your code and the paper the logic for the layer itself seems fine, so it may not be worth sending it someone who doesn't use PyTorch. Once you send in a PR I'll comment further on the code itself.
